name: Samyam Dhamala
headline: Data Analyst • QA Engineer • IT Support | M.S. Information Science
about: I'm a Data Analyst and QA Engineer with 4+ years of experience in data validation, BI dashboards, test automation, and IT support. I recently completed my M.S. in Information Science at the University of New Haven (4.0 GPA) and have worked as a Technical Support Assistant and Python Teaching Assistant there. I combine a QA mindset with strong SQL, Power BI, and Python skills to validate data, build reports, and improve system reliability. I'm targeting Data Analyst, Business Analyst, QA Engineer, and IT Support roles. No visa sponsorship required.
